name: nodejs
description: Backend Architecture Node.js with Express node-express/ ├── src/ │   ├── controllers/     # Request handlers (e.g., authController, taskController) │   ├── models/          # Data models (e.g., User, Task) │   ├── routes/          # Route definitions (e.g., authRoutes, taskRoutes) │   ├── middleware/      # Middleware functions (e.g., authMiddleware) │   ├── config/          # Configuration files (e.g., dbConfig, jwtConfig) │   ├── app.js           # Main application file │   └── server.js        # Server entry point ├── .env                 # Environment variables └── package.json         # Project configuration and dependencies
